alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and Madison Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Monticello to 17 miles east of Woodville to 11 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Madison, Perry, Greenville, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Scanlon, Lovett, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Foley, Wacissa and Wacissa Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
